about_the_game:
Your Islands Are in Danger, Lord!

In a majestic land composed of countless islands, enemies have risen to destroy your settlements and annihilate your people. Yet, as the Lord of these lands, you are the last line of defense! Combine your real-time strategy skills and tactical thinking to build the perfect army, position your soldiers strategically, and defend your islands against enemy invasions.

This captivating game blends a minimalist art style with a dramatic atmosphere, immersing you in a world of intense battles and critical decisions. On each unique island, you will fight to protect your people and repel invaders. Enhance your Lord's leadership abilities, strengthen your troops, and take part in the battlefield not only as a commander but also as a warrior. Victory is only the beginning; the real battle is for the hope of your people and the fate of your islands.

Each enemy wave grows stronger and more relentless, but you are not alone. Summon troops from different races, utilize their unique abilities, and assemble an army capable of overcoming any challenge. Your strategic mind and quick decisions will be your greatest weapons in this fight.

Key Features:

REAL-TIME STRATEGY AND TACTICS: Combine different soldier types to build a flawless defense against waves of enemies. Each attack is a puzzle waiting to be solved!

UPGRADABLE LORD AND TROOPS: Gain experience in battles to enhance your Lord and your army. Unlock new abilities, unleash powerful attacks, and create an unstoppable defense line.

DIVERSE ISLAND DESIGNS: Each island presents a unique challenge. Tailor your strategies to the geography of the battlefield and turn the tide against your enemies.

MULTIPLE RACES AND UNIQUE ABILITIES: Enrich your army with soldiers from various races. Explore their special abilities to gain an edge over your foes.

MINIMALIST ART AND DEEP ATMOSPHERE: The simplicity of the minimalist visuals blends seamlessly with the dramatic atmosphere of war. Feel the tranquility and chaos of the battlefield.

COMMAND ARMIES AND FIGHT AS A LORD: Beyond leading your soldiers, you can also join the battle as a Lord. Develop your own skills to shift the course of the war in your favor.

UNLIMITED STRATEGY AND DEPTH: Shape your army, outmaneuver your enemies, and claim victory through perfect tactics. Every decision you make can be the difference between triumph and defeat.

A GRIPPING STORYLINE: Amid waves of enemies, become a beacon of hope for your people. Each battle rewrites the destiny of your islands and creates a legend of salvation.

Your islands await your leadership, Lord! Test your courage and strategic brilliance, protect your people, and bring peace back to these lands. But remember, this is not a fight for glory; it is a battle for survival!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.8+
  • Processor: 2.50Ghz Intel core i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 5750 1GB
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

name: Lord Of Island

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X4 5350, Intel Core i3-2100T or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 480M, Radeon HD 6790 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7+
  • Processor: AMD Athlon X4 605e, Intel Celeron G1610 or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon HD 7850, GeForce GTX 470 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes

short_description: Defend your islands with real-time strategy and tactics! Lead as a Lord, build armies from diverse races, and defeat invading enemies. In a minimalist world, utilize each island’s unique design to rewrite the fate of your people and the destiny of your lands.
supported_languages: English, French, Turkish, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Russian
